remarks: If the domain of a function exists, so the function.  Part of Theorem 4.15(v) of [Monk1] p. 46.  This theorem is derived using the Axiom of Replacement in the form of ~ fnex .  (Note:  Any resemblance between F.U.N.E.X. and "Have You Any Eggs" is purely a coincidence originated by Swedish chefs.)  (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-1995.)
statement: funex $p |- ( ( Fun F /\ dom F e. B ) -> F e. _V ) $.
